entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Twillingate

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning near midnight. Amount 5 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Wind becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 before morning. Low minus 3. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 5 in the morning then steady. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 5 in the morning then steady. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Tuesday 27 December 2022
